channel.title: How do I join MY hamatchi server?
channel.description: Yo, I have made my own Hamatchi server (couse I can't make no-ip, don't know how to do), I have followed a newly made tut, but it didn't mention how to get on your own server, I tried to run and then log in with the IP but it didn't work (I haven't joined my own server, just logging into Hamatchi, do nothing else), I tried with my computer IP didn't work... What shall I do for joining it?

item.title: How do I join MY hamatchi server?
item.dc:creator: @texis11 texis11
item.description:
@texis11 wrote:

Hamatchi is not trojan, then the antivirus would tell me… it stops everything… even songs I get from friends. what you mean with find the IP it was on?

Read full topic
item.source: How do I join MY hamatchi server?

item.title: How do I join MY hamatchi server?
item.dc:creator: @Skating_On_Java Elite2142
item.description:
@Skating_On_Java wrote:

BTW hamachi has a trojan. Just find the IP it was on, and use that because ur already connected.

Read full topic

item.title: How do I join MY hamatchi server?

item.description:
@texis11 wrote:

Yo, I have made my own Hamatchi server (couse I can’t make no-ip, don’t know how to do), I have followed a newly made tut, but it didn’t mention how to get on your own server, I tried to run and then log in with the IP but it didn’t work (I haven’t joined my own server, just logging into Hamatchi, do nothing else), I tried with my computer IP didn’t work… What shall I do for joining it?

Read full topic
